interactions.interact_text: Lead villager while holding a hay bale
Stop leading villager with hay bale

command: msg @a[r=6] can be tempted with a hay bale
msg @a[r=6] can no longer be tempted.
msg @a[r=9] now song leader for Albert Whitefish song.
msg @a[r=9] no longer song leader for Albert Whitefish song.

queue_command.command: execute as @s at @s if entity @e[type=villager,r=12,c=7,tag=!albert_whitefish_song_leader] run event entity @s found_valid_singing_conditions

command: execute as @s at @s run playsound villager.albert_whitefish_song @a[r=70] ~ ~ ~
